pages.text: Most recipes in your altar require Gemstone Powder as a source of magical energy.$(br2)Gemstone Powder comes in various colors and can be acquired by pulverizing gemstone shards via $(l:general/anvil_crushing)Anvil Crushing$().

pages.title: Mixing Colors 1
pages.text: There is nothing more important to a upcoming artist than mixing the right paint.$(br)Unfortunately, you found that in the case of your Gemstone Powder, it's not nearly as easy as it initially seemed: The powders don't quite want to mix. The result is always a multicolored mass.$(br)You need an intermediate solution.

pages.title: Mixing Colors 2
pages.text: The closeness to nature of your gemstones suggests that nature must be both the source and the answer! Quickly you make a few notes and $(l:general/colored_trees)out tumbled a recipe$(), which looks very promising.
